register.description: The Memory Attribute register contains the attributes for all the first 16M mapped regions. Offset = 0h + (y * 4h); where y = 0h to 7Fh

bitfield.description: This defines the type for the memory. 0h = Device 1h = Writeback 2h = Writethrough 3h = Non-cacheable
This defines the shareability domain of the memory. 0h = Non-shared 1h = Inner shared 2h = Outer shared 3h = System shared
This defines the outer allocatability of the memory. 0h = Non-allocatable 1h = Writes allocate, reads do not 2h = Reads allocate, writes do not 3h = Reads and writes allocate
This defines the inner allocatability of the memory. 0h = Non-allocatable 1h = Writes allocate, reads do not 2h = Reads allocate, writes do not 3h = Reads and writes allocate

register.description: The Memory Attribute register contains the attributes for all the second 16M mapped regions. Offset = 200h + (y * 4h); where y = 0h to 1FFFh

bitfield.description: This defines the type for the memory. 0h = Device 1h = Writeback 2h = Writethrough 3h = Non-cacheable
This defines the shareability domain of the memory. 0h = Non-shared 1h = Inner shared 2h = Outer shared 3h = System shared
This defines the outer allocatability of the memory. 0h = Non-allocatable 1h = Writes allocate, reads do not 2h = Reads allocate, writes do not 3h = Reads and writes allocate
This defines the inner allocatability of the memory. 0h = Non-allocatable 1h = Writes allocate, reads do not 2h = Reads allocate, writes do not 3h = Reads and writes allocate
